#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){

        int n,i,j;
        cin>>n;

        int count=0;
        for(j=2;j<=n;j++){

            i=j;
            while(i>=1){
                if(i%2==1)
                    count++;
                i/=2;
                }
            }

        cout<<count+1<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
